question: Will the Poloniex hacker return the stolen funds by Nov 17?
description:
On November 10, 2023, Poloniex was hacked for around $120 million dollars. Shortly afterwards Justin Sun tweeted to the unknown hacker that they have 7 days to return the funds before engaging law enforcement (see https://twitter.com/justinsuntron/status/1722951876986204259).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least 80% of the money hacked from Poloniex is returned by Nov 17, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Poloniex and Justin Sun, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Wizards vs. Hornets
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for November 10, 7:00 PM ET:

If the Washington Wizards win, the market will resolve to “Wizards”.

If the Charlotte Hornets win, the market will resolve to “Hornets”.

 If the game is not completed by November 17, 2023 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.
